sentences.en: And active infrared night - vision goggles under any circumstances can see things.
sentences.cn: 而主动红外夜视镜在任何情况下都能看到东西.

sentences.en: And protect your eyes from snow and ice glare with dark glasses or goggles.
sentences.cn: 使用深色眼镜或者护目镜来保护你的眼镜不受冰雪眩光的影响。

sentences.en: Eyes - wear chemical safety goggles unless a full face piece respirator is worn.
sentences.cn: 眼部 - 需戴化学安全护目镜,除非已戴防毒面罩.

sentences.en: First - Aid Personal Protection: Wear respirator, rubber gloves , goggles and protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 对急救人员之防护: 戴口罩 、 手套、面具、防护衣.

sentences.en: How to choose the laser protective goggles is also explained.
sentences.cn: 介绍了如何选择激光防护镜.

sentences.en: Is personal protective equipment worn ie . Ear plugs , overalls, gloves, masks, goggles?
sentences.cn: 工人有否配带安全设备:如耳塞 、 手套 、 面罩 、 眼罩等等?

sentences.en: My swimming goggles keep steaming up so I can't see.
sentences.cn: 我的护目镜一直有水雾,所以我看不见.

sentences.en: Night Vision Goggles Amplifies vision and allows the Marine to maneuver better.
sentences.cn: 增强视野以方便陆战队员更好地行动.

sentences.en: Our produce contains Harley goggles , skiing goggles, helmet visors, motorcycle goggles, ext.
sentences.cn: 公司主要产品包括:哈雷风镜, 滑雪风镜, 头盔镜片, 摩托车头盔等骑士装备.

sentences.en: Personal Protection: Wesr respirator, rubber gloves, goggles and protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 个人应注意事项: 戴口罩 、 橡胶手套 、 护目镜防护衣.

sentences.en: Skiers wear goggles to protect their eyes from the sun.
sentences.cn: 滑雪者都戴上护目镜使眼睛不受阳光伤害.

sentences.en: The standards of laser laser protective goggles are given.
sentences.cn: 列出了激光防护镜的标准.

sentences.en: The two types of goggles to choose shortsightedness is not the same.
sentences.cn: 这两种类型近视泳镜的选择也是不一样的.

sentences.en: Wear facemask and protective goggles that accord with safety standard.
sentences.cn: 使用符合安全标准的护面罩及护目镜.

sentences.en: Wear goggles when you're doing carpentry or even yard work.
sentences.cn: 23当你干木活甚至院子活时戴护目镜.

sentences.en: You must wear goggles and a mask that will protect you against the fumes.
sentences.cn: 为了免受烟雾危害，你必须戴上护目镜和面罩。

words.tran_cn: [安全]护目镜；防护眼镜；瞪视（goggle的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 护目镜，护目镜，防风镜，防水镜( goggle的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: a pair of  glasses  made of glass or plastic with a rubber or plastic edge that fit against your skin and protect your eyes

trans.tran_cn: 睁大眼睛瞪视， （惊讶的）转动眼珠( goggle的第三人称单数 )
